title: The Dover Boys at Pimento University or The Rivals of Roquefort Hall

sources.title: The Dover Boys at Pimento University or The Rivals of Roquefort Hall (1942)
sources.description: The Dover Boys at Pimento University; or, The Rivals of Roquefort Hall (also known as The Dover Boys) is a 1942 Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies cartoon directed by Chuck Jones. The short was released on September 19, 1942. The cartoon is a parody of the Rover Boys, a popular juvenile fiction book series of the early 20th century. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-dover-boys-at-pimento-university-or-the-rivals-of-roquefort-hall-1942/

metadata.Plot: A 1942 Merrie Melodies cartoon depicting the exploits of the Dover Boys, Tom, Dick and Larry (of Pimento University), and their rescue of dainty Dora Standpipe (of Miss Cheddar's Female Academy) from the clutches of coward, bully, cad and thief Dan Backslide.
metadata.Writer: Tedd Pierce, Chuck Couch, Warren Foster
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Bea Benaderet, John McLeish
